languages.text: "Что-то вы подозрительно себя ведете, господин офицер. Отпираетесь, хотите сбежать... Извольте в допросную. Или мне силу применить? Я ж могу, у меня — полномочия".

"You are acting suspiciously, officer. First you deny involvement, then you try to escape... Let us adjourn to the interrogation room. Or will I have to use force? I certainly have the authority to do so."
languages.original_text: "Что-то вы подозрительно себя ведете, господин офицер. Отпираетесь, хотите сбежать... Извольте в допросную. Или мне силу применить? Я ж могу, у меня — полномочия".

traits.locale_text: "You are acting suspiciously, officer. You deny involvement and try to escape. Let us adjourn to the interrogation room. Or should I use force? I certainly have the authority."
"You are acting suspiciously, officer. You deny involvement and try to escape. Let us adjourn to the interrogation room. Or should I use force? I certainly have the authority."

"You are acting suspiciously, officer. You deny involvement, and yet you try to escape. Let us adjourn to the interrogation room. Or will I have to use force? I certainly have the authority to do so."

"You are acting suspiciously, officer. You deny involvement, and yet you try to escape. Let us adjourn to the interrogation room. Or will I have to use force? I certainly have the authority to do so."

"You are acting suspiciously, officer. First you deny involvement, then you try to escape... Let us adjourn to the interrogation room. Or will I have to use force? I certainly have the authority to do so."

"You are acting suspiciously, officer. First you deny involvement, then you try to escape... Let us adjourn to the interrogation room. Or will I have to use force? I certainly have the authority to do so."

"You are acting suspiciously, officer. First you deny involvement, then you try to escape... Let us adjourn to the interrogation room. Or will I have to use force? I certainly have the authority to do so."

languages.text: "Ihr verhaltet Euch verdächtig, Offizier. Erst bestreitet Ihr Eure Beteiligung und dann versucht ihr, zu fliehen ... Reden wir im Verhörzimmer weiter. Oder muss ich Gewalt anwenden? Dazu bin ich definitiv befugt."
languages.original_text: "You are acting suspiciously, officer. First you deny involvement, then you try to escape... Let us adjourn to the interrogation room. Or will I have to use force? I certainly have the authority to do so."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr verhaltet Euch verdächtig, Offizier. Erst bestreitet Ihr Eure Beteiligung und dann versucht ihr, zu fliehen ... Reden wir im Verhörzimmer weiter. Oder muss ich Gewalt anwenden? Dazu bin ich definitiv befugt."

languages.text: « Vous agissez de manière on ne peut plus suspecte, officier. Vous commencez par nier toute implication, puis vous tentez de vous enfuir... Poursuivons cette discussion dans la salle d'interrogatoire. Ou préférez-vous peut-être que nous fassions usage de la force ? J'ai toute autorité pour le faire. »
languages.original_text: "You are acting suspiciously, officer. First you deny involvement, then you try to escape... Let us adjourn to the interrogation room. Or will I have to use force? I certainly have the authority to do so."

traits.locale_text: « Vous agissez de manière on ne peut plus suspecte, officier. Vous commencez par nier toute implication, puis vous tentez de vous enfuir... Poursuivons cette discussion dans la salle d'interrogatoire. Ou préférez-vous peut-être que nous fassions usage de la force ? J'ai toute autorité pour le faire. »

languages.text: «Oficial, su comportamiento es muy sospechoso. Primero niega haber estado involucrado y ahora intenta escapar... Continuemos esto en la sala de interrogatorios. ¿O piensa hacerme recurrir a la fuerza? Tengo autoridad para ello».
languages.original_text: "You are acting suspiciously, officer. First you deny involvement, then you try to escape... Let us adjourn to the interrogation room. Or will I have to use force? I certainly have the authority to do so."

traits.locale_text: «Oficial, su comportamiento es muy sospechoso. Primero niega haber estado involucrado y ahora intenta escapar... Continuemos esto en la sala de interrogatorios. ¿O piensa hacerme recurrir a la fuerza? Tengo autoridad para ello».

languages.text: 「お前の行動が疑わしいんだ、士官殿。第一に関与を否定し、その後、逃げ出そうとした...取調室に戻るとしよう。それとも、実力行使した方がいいか？私にはその権限がある」
languages.original_text: "You are acting suspiciously, officer. First you deny involvement, then you try to escape... Let us adjourn to the interrogation room. Or will I have to use force? I certainly have the authority to do so."

traits.locale_text: 「お前の行動が疑わしいんだ、士官殿。第一に関与を否定し、その後、逃げ出そうとした...取調室に戻るとしよう。それとも、実力行使した方がいいか？私にはその権限がある」

languages.text: “你的行为很可疑，军官。你先是否认和这件事情有关，之后又打算逃跑。我们还是去审讯室吧，还是说，我必须动用武力才行？很显然，我有权这么做。”
languages.original_text: "You are acting suspiciously, officer. First you deny involvement, then you try to escape... Let us adjourn to the interrogation room. Or will I have to use force? I certainly have the authority to do so."

traits.locale_text: “你的行为很可疑，军官。你先是否认和这件事情有关，之后又打算逃跑。我们还是去审讯室吧，还是说，我必须动用武力才行？很显然，我有权这么做。”

languages.text: "Şüpheli davranışlar sergiliyorsun subay. Önce dâhil olduğunu inkâr ettin, sonra da kaçmaya çalıştın... Artık sorgu odasına geçelim mi yoksa güç kullanmamız mı gerekiyor? Güç kullanma yetkisine gayet sahibim."
languages.original_text: "You are acting suspiciously, officer. First you deny involvement, then you try to escape... Let us adjourn to the interrogation room. Or will I have to use force? I certainly have the authority to do so."
